sentence.Network_en: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

sentence.Network_en: These gases would seriously damage the patient's respiratory system.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些毒气会严重损害患者的呼吸系统。

sentence.Network_en: In November 1941 Payne was seriously ill with pneumonia.

jx.jx_en_mean: regard someone or something as important and worthy of attention
jx.jx_cn_mean: 严肃认真对待某人（或某事）

entry.def: You use seriously to indicate that you are not joking and that you really mean what you say.

example.ex: Seriously, I only smoke in the evenings.

entry.tran: (用以询问对方的话是否是认真的)当真,真的.
entry.def: You say 'seriously' when you are surprised by what someone has said, as a way of asking them if they really mean it.

example.ex: 'I tried to chat him up at the general store.' He laughed. 'Seriously?'
example.tran: “我在杂货店里试图跟他搭讪来着。”他笑着说。“真的?”

entry.tran: 认真对待;把…看得很重要
entry.def: If you take someone or something seriously, you believe that they are important and deserve attention.

example.ex: It's hard to take them seriously in their pretty grey uniforms...
example.tran: 他们穿着帅气的灰色制服时，很难对他们郑重其事起来。

example.ex: The phrase was not meant to be taken seriously.

sentences.sentence: "a play dealing seriously with the question of divorce"

means.word_mean: 2. to a severe or serious degree;

sentences.sentence: "fingers so badly frozen they had to be amputated"

auth_sentence.content: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.

auth_sentence.content: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.
auth_sentence.res_content: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We take very seriously our duty to pay tax.

Sentence.sentence: Along with the deaths, the report said that the lives of 325 million people, primarily in poor countries, were being seriously affected by climate change.
Benjamin Franklin, a famous American diplomat, writer and scientist, died in 1790, but his proverb "Time is money" is taken more seriously by Americans of today than ever before.
There's no question that there're people who're seriously in trouble because they're overdoing their Internet involvement," said psychiatrist (精神科医生) Ivan Goldberg
It got seriously damaged on the way.
We should take this concern seriously as universities are key in the national innovation system
Many people are seriously concerned by this - and the company is likely to face challenges in other courts around the world.

sentences.en: actions which seriously impinge on other people’s personal freedoms
sentences.cn: 严重侵犯他人人身自由的行为

sentences.en: He is seriously ill. I’m afraid he cannot live out one more week.
sentences.cn: 他已病入膏肓,恐怕活不到一周了。

sentences.en: Being seriously ill,and in fear of death,he made his will.
sentences.cn: 他病得很重,害怕会死去,便立了遗嘱。

sentences.en: Emotional problems can seriously interfere with a student’s work.
sentences.cn: 感情问题可能严重妨碍学生的学习。

sentences.en: Four people were seriously injured in a head-on smash on the A45.
sentences.cn: 在A45 号公路两车迎头相撞的事故中，4 人严重受伤。

sentences.en: An educational system which fails to teach basic arithmetic is seriously deficient.
sentences.cn: 一个没教基础算术知识的教育体制是有严重缺陷的。

sentences.en: His criticism started me thinking seriously.
sentences.cn: 他的批评使我开始认真思考。

sentences.en: Bobby is going about his homework very seriously tonight.
sentences.cn: 鲍比今天晚上在非常认真地做功课。

sentences.en: Getting approval for the plan is a purely formal matter: nobody will seriously oppose it.
sentences.cn: 使计划得到批准只是程序而已:没人会真正反对的。

sentences.en: Any view of Shostakovich is seriously incomplete without knowledge of these recordings.
sentences.cn: 如果不了解这些唱片，对肖斯塔科维奇就根本不能作出全面的评判。

sentences.en: We told him he was in danger but he didn’t take us seriously.
sentences.cn: 我们告诉他他面临危险，可是他不把我们的话当回事。

sentences.en: Don’t take her seriously,she’s just acting out.
sentences.cn: 别对她的行为信以为真,她只是在表演。

sentences.en: How foolish you should be if you were to take these words seriously.
sentences.cn: 如果你把这些话当真,那你真是太傻了。

sentences.en: Don’t take it so seriously — it was just a put-on.
sentences.cn: 别当真—不过是开个玩笑而已。

sentences.en: Don’t take her seriously,it’s all an act.
sentences.cn: 别跟她认真,她完全是装腔作势罢了。
